name: llm.nvim (Kurama622)
description: [项目级] A large language model (LLM) plugin for Neovim, provides commands to interact with LLM (like ChatGPT, Copilot, ChatGLM, kimi, deepseek, openrouter and local llms). Support Github models.。来源: https://github.com/Kurama622/llm.nvim

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A large language model (LLM) plugin for Neovim, provides commands to interact with LLM (like ChatGPT, Copilot, ChatGLM, kimi, deepseek, openrouter and local llms). Support Github models.

来源: https://github.com/Kurama622/llm.nvim
语言: Lua
Stars: 461

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

LICENSE
README.md

after
after/syntax
basic_template.lua
docs
docs/functions
docs/tools
examples
examples/ai-tools
examples/chat
examples/ui
lua
lua/llm
plugin
plugin/llm.lua
stylua.toml

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: `enable_cword_context = true`: Translate the text under the cursor in normal mode.
